effect.shortEffect: Lets the Pokémon's normal and fighting moves hit ghost Pokémon.
effect.full: This Pokémon ignores ghost-type Pokémon's immunity to normal- and fighting-type moves. Ghost Pokémon's other types affect damage as usual.

description.diamond-pearl: Enables moves to hit Ghost-type foes.
description.platinum: Enables moves to hit Ghost-type foes.
description.heartgold-soulsilver: Enables moves to hit Ghost-type foes.
description.black-white: Enables moves to hit Ghost-type Pokémon.
description.black-2-white-2: Enables moves to hit Ghost-type Pokémon.
description.x-y: Makes Normal- and Fighting-type moves hit Ghost-type Pokémon.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Makes Normal- and Fighting-type moves hit Ghost-type Pokémon.
description.sun-moon: The Pokémon can hit Ghost-type Pokémon with Normal- and Fighting-type moves.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The Pokémon can hit Ghost-type Pokémon with Normal- and Fighting-type moves.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The Pokémon can hit Ghost-type Pokémon with Normal- and Fighting-type moves.
description.sword-shield: The Pokémon can hit Ghost-type Pokémon with Normal- and Fighting-type moves.
